title: Kanye West’s strange way of getting Drake’s attention
text:
Cape Town - Ever since becoming a born-again Christian, rapper Kanye West is making a lot of changes in his life such as no longer cursing and banning his album collaborators from having premarital sex – now the rapper seems to want to squash the beef he has with Drake.

READ MORE: Kanye West asked his album collaborators not to have premarital sex

According to Independent UK, Drake and Kanye’s beef dates as far back as 2008 when the two squabbled over securing the same manager, Cortez Bryant. Their friendship became even more strained when the two started dissing each other and when Drake was seen with Kanye’s ex Amber Rose.

But it seems like Kanye is ready to put all that behind him by trying to get Drake’s attention in the strangest way. Speaking during an interview with Zane Lowe, the Jesus Is King rapper revealed how he tries to make peace with Drake by leaving him notes at his house, which is in the same neighbourhood as Kanye’s home.

"You cannot be in service to God and be mad at your brother next door," Yeezy first said.

"I go to Drake’s house. I walk over there with no security and just will leave my phone number. Here’s my cell. I’m not trying to ring the doorbell and say, 'You gotta come outside right now.' He might be busy. He got a studio in there," he continued.

And speaking on his controversial relationship with Jay Z, Yeezy said there were levels to rap icons.

"With Jay, I love all of these people, but you got to know there’s a lineage of Jay to Ye to Drake," West continued.

"This person is your idol. Then you get to know 'em, then you be friends, then you turn to frenemies, then you turn to enemies, and then you gotta bring back the positive energy. But that is the lineage of rap kings and inspirers."
description: Ever since becoming a born-again Christian, rapper Kanye West is making a lot of changes in his life.
